thread.title: Teenager docked over threat to kidnap employee
thread.title_full: Teenager docked over threat to kidnap employee

author: Okogba
title: Teenager docked over threat to kidnap employee
text:
Home » News » Teenager docked over threat to kidnap employee Teenager docked over threat to kidnap employee On 4:56 am In News by Okogba Comments 
By Onozure Dania 
L agos— A teenager, Evelyn Angese, who allegedly attempted to kidnap her boss and demanded N5 million ransom, was yesterday arraigned before an Igbosere magistrate’s court in Lagos. 
Angese, 18, who is a housekeeper, is facing a five-count charge bordering on conspiracy, attempted kidnap, threat to life and demanding for ransom money, preferred against her by the police. 
The defendant pleaded innocence to the crime. 
The police prosecutor, Sergeant Tubi Olajide, had told the court that the defendant committed the alleged offences on August 22, 2016. 
Magistrate O. M. Ajayi, while delivering ruling on the bail application of the teenager, admitted her to bail, in the sum of N500,000, with two sureties in like sum. 
She ordered that the sureties must be working in a reputable organisa-tion, must show evidence of tax payment to Lagos State Government and their addresses verified. 
Ajayi adjourned the case till March 1.
